Author: Traderbtcc
Title: [ANN]PikCars- Revolutionizing Ridesharing Through Blockchain & Social Network!
Body: Introducing PikCars!    Website | Blog | Whitepaper  | Twitter | Facebook | Telegram |  Pikcars is a hybrid start-up aimed at tokenizing the ride-sharing industry through our blockchain based payment solution called Pikpay. Pikcars combine ridesharing, blockchain payment solution and location based social network. Pikcars is a hybrid app that combines the traditional system with the blockchain technology to provide a seamless, cashless, cheaper and secure transaction settlement. Riders can also pay with fiat, payment with our token at a discounted price.  This has being an amazing evolution, but this technology is still faced with challenges of financial censorship and limitation to emerging markets. Blockchain technology today is disrupting the financial, gaming, music, health industries by simplifying, reducing the cost of operation and also eliminating financial censorship through decentralized digital money built on the blockchain technology. Pikcars aims to tokenize the ridesharing industry and also integrate a location based social platform where users can chat, connect and interact with one another.    The Pikcars Ecosystem:   The PikCars team would be developing a mobile application. The PikCars mobile app will be integrated with three independent features co-existing together to form the PikCars ecosystem.  PikCars  Pikcars is a peer2peer ridesharing service of our pikcars ecosystem. Pikcars ridesharing app combine Mapping/Geo-location function, Driving direction solution, Google Map (mapping software) and a notification system (email, sms and push notification) to provide an easy peer2peer ridesharing mobile app. PikConnect  Pikconnect is a location based social network on the PikCars mobile app which allow user to connect with others users within their location. Pikconnect is designed to create a social community within the Pikcars ecosystem and enhance users experience. PikPay  Pikpay is an ethereum based payment solution integrated on our ridesharing mobile app to facilitate seamless, fast, cheaper and secure transaction. Pikpay payment gateway uses Piik the native token of Pikcars ecosystem to power all transaction on the ecosystem.     Token information   Name - Pik Token Symbol - Pik Decimals - 8 Total supply - 20,000,000,000 Softcap - 300 ETH Hardcap - 600 ETH 1 ETH - 20m Pik Contract address: https://etherscan.io/address/0xbfffc5ae8f7c87e9c4eaa1ef88c2a6c219a1563d   Token Distribution  →60% Token Sale →12 % Development (locked for 8months) →7% Marketing →7% Team ( locked for 3months) →2% Advisors (locked for 2months) →2% Bounty/Airdrop →10% Founder ( locked for 1 year)     Official media links   Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/officialpikcars/ Twitter - https://twitter.com/pikcars Medium - https://medium.com/@pikcars Github - https://github.com/Pikcars Main Telegram - https://t.me/pikcars_official   Posting on behalf of the PikCars team        [/list][/list]
